concept.display: T0: No evidence of primary tumor (breast)
T4b: Tumor of any size with edema (including peau d'orange) ...
T4a: Tumor of any size with extension to chest wall, not incl...
TX: Primary tumor cannot be assessed (breast)
T4c: Tumor of any size with direct extension to chest wall...
T1: Tumor 2 cm or less in greatest dimension (breast)
T1mic: Microinvasion 0.1 cm or less in greatest dimension...
Tis: Paget's disease of the nipple with no tumor
T2: Tumor more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm...
T1c: Tumor more than 1 cm but not more than 2 cm...
T4: Tumor of any size with direct extension to chest wall...
T3: Tumor more than 5 cm in greatest dimension (breast)
T1b: Tumor more than 0.5 cm but not more than 1 cm...
T1a: Tumor more than 0.1 cm but not more than 0.5 cm...
